sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> has a <radical>hat</radical> that's made from a <radical>tree</radical> but the more you look at it, the more it looks like it's just a big <kanji>cork</kanji>. It's a big, wooden <kanji>plug</kanji> that he's just placed on his head. It can hardly be called a hat.
meaningInfo: Picture how silly the king looks with this cork on his head. He kind of looks like a fat, plugged up bottle of wine when he yells now.
readingMnemonic: It turned out this <kanji>cork</kanji> hat was given to him by a <reading>cen</reading>taur (<ja>せん</ja>). You look into it and it turned out it IS a really big cork that centaurs use on their big wine casks. But the king didn't understand, and thought it was a hat. The centaurs are probably still laughing.
readingInfo: Picture the centaurs drinking and giggling, putting the cork from their wine on their head to imitate the stupid king.
